channel.title: Emmys 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Michelle Williams Muses on the Real Love Story at the Center of ‘Dying for Sex’
item.description: “Friendship can be as passionate as a romantic relationship,” says the star of the FX series, who’s up for an Emmy for best actress in a limited series for her portrayal of real-life podcaster Molly K

item.description: “Friendship can be as passionate as a romantic relationship,” says the star of the FX series, who’s up for an Emmy for best actress in a limited series for her portrayal of real-life podcaster Molly K

item.title: Noah Wyle on ‘The Pitt’ Storylines Mirroring the Real World: “We Got Lucky a Few Times”
item.description: The HBO series debuted an episode about a measles outbreak the same week measles cases accelerated in the U.S.

item.title: John Oliver Talks Legal Battles, Late Night Turmoil and Clapping Back at His Owners
item.description: The ‘Last Week Tonight’ host also sounds off on Stephen Colbert’s “horrible, horrible” news and the future of the format.

item.title: Emmy Anomalies: Their Shows Were Snubbed, But They Weren’t
item.description: Nearly a dozen of this year’s acting nominees were from series that were otherwise completely shut out.

item.title: Anthony Mackie Jokes He’s the “White Dude Legend” After Multiple Co-Stars Earned Emmy and Oscar Nominations
item.description: The Marvel actor also revealed why he’s happy to come in second place after being nominated for a guest actor Emmy this year.

item.title: Anthony Mackie Jokes He’s the “White Dude Legend” After Multiple Co-Stars Earned Emmy and Oscar Nominations
item.description: The Marvel actor also revealed why he’s happy to come in second place after being nominated for a guest actor Emmy this year.

item.title: Emmy Nominations 2025: Historic, Record-Breaking and Otherwise Notable Nominees
item.description: Kathy Bates, Owen Cooper and Bella Ramsey all made history with their Emmy noms, while Martin Scorsese, Harrison Ford and Kristen Bell are among those who earned their first acting nods.

item.title: Emmy Nominations 2025: Historic, Record-Breaking and Otherwise Notable Nominees
item.description: Kathy Bates, Owen Cooper and Bella Ramsey all made history with their Emmy noms, while Martin Scorsese, Harrison Ford and Kristen Bell are among those who earned their first acting nods.

item.title: Where to Watch the 2025 Emmy-Nominated Comedy Series Online
item.description: ‘The Studio,’ ‘Hacks’ and ‘The Bear’ were among the comedy titles with the most nominations — find out how to watch this year’s nominees without cable.

item.title: Where to Watch the 2025 Emmy-Nominated Comedy Series Online
item.description: ‘The Studio,’ ‘Hacks’ and ‘The Bear’ were among the comedy titles with the most nominations — find out how to watch this year’s nominees without cable.

item.title: First-Time Nominee Cooper Koch Is “Devastated” Over Emmy Snubs for Two of His ‘Monsters’ Co-Stars
item.description: “That’s the one sort of bummer from today,” says Koch, who was nominated for best lead actor for his portrayal of Erik Menendez in ‘Monsters: The Lyle and Erik Menendez Story.’

item.title: First-Time Nominee Cooper Koch Is “Devastated” Over Emmy Snubs for Two of His ‘Monsters’ Co-Stars
item.description: “That’s the one sort of bummer from today,” says Koch, who was nominated for best lead actor for his portrayal of Erik Menendez in ‘Monsters: The Lyle and Erik Menendez Story.’

item.title: Emmys: Listen to 66 Nominees on THR’s ‘Awards Chatter’ Podcast
item.description: Tune in to Scott Feinberg’s conversations with nominated performers, voice-over artists, game show hosts, narrators, directors, writers, producers and composers.

item.title: Emmys: Listen to 66 Nominees on THR’s ‘Awards Chatter’ Podcast
item.description: Tune in to Scott Feinberg’s conversations with nominated performers, voice-over artists, game show hosts, narrators, directors, writers, producers and composers.

item.title: MomTok on Top: ‘The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives’ Earns First Emmy Nomination
item.description: Hulu’s breakout series, centered around a group of Mormon mom influencers, was nominated in the outstanding unstructured reality program category on Tuesday.

item.title: MomTok on Top: ‘The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives’ Earns First Emmy Nomination
item.description: Hulu’s breakout series, centered around a group of Mormon mom influencers, was nominated in the outstanding unstructured reality program category on Tuesday.

item.title: Bela Bajaria on Which Emmy Nominee She Texted First and One Giant “Disappointment” of a Snub
item.description: Netflix’s chief content officer talks to The Hollywood Reporter about posthumous ‘The Residence’ nominations, and what gift you send the youngest-ever nominee for supporting actor in a limited series.

item.description: Netflix’s chief content officer talks to The Hollywood Reporter about posthumous ‘The Residence’ nominations, and what gift you send the youngest-ever nominee for supporting actor in a limited series.

item.title: ‘The White Lotus’ Checks Into the 2025 Emmy Noms With 23, Ties With ‘The Studio’
item.description: However, the Mike White-born series left a few key castmembers like Patrick Schwarzenegger, Michelle Monaghan, Sam Nivola and Leslie Bibb without nominations.

item.description: However, the Mike White-born series left a few key castmembers like Patrick Schwarzenegger, Michelle Monaghan, Sam Nivola and Leslie Bibb without nominations.

item.title: Apple’s Matt Cherniss on Record Emmy Haul and ‘Studio’ Breakthrough: “Their Gut Was Right”
item.description: The tech giant’s streaming service received its most nominations ever for the second straight year.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.

item.title: Emmys 2025: List of Nominees
item.description: ‘Severance’ leads the nominees with a total of 27 mentions, followed by ‘The Penguin’ (24), ‘The Studio’ and ‘The White Lotus’ (23 apiece) and ‘The Last of Us’ (16).
